Name: Wicked Paradise
About the game: Story Take control of a young man who struggles to find a place in the world and doesn't know what lies before him. Even with an easy life and a few downfalls, he feels like it's been only a failures. Living in the city of Los Edenos he cannot afford to be down bad. Until he's approached with a life-changing offer, that can potentially bring him closer to a life he thinks he deserves... Or ruin everything. Discover people's stories around you and your inevitable consecration into a world of crime. Build relationships with them. Your choices may or may not get you what you desire. Game Features Free-roam, point and click navigation with interactable environment and dating-sim elements. Uniquely created 3D instances. High quality QHD renders and animations. Event replay allowing you to relive every event, times and times again.
